text: hello. We were recommended by your support to check with you here the feasability of our project. sorry in advance if this is the wrong channel. We are actively looking for a way to use your CRO features and customize it with our data for unknown visitors. As people are not logged in or email known, would it be possible at this stage to use the value of your cookie "HubSpotutk" to cookie-sync and then exchange data (maybe serverless)? thanks for your help or suggestions
